issue.title: Set some vector fields to default access level for Drill compatibility
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Drill has methods for serializing and deserializing value vectors, and this functionality was not included in the code checked into the Arrow repo. It was kept in drill. For these Drill methods to work, some private vector fields need to be made package level so that the Drill helper methods can access them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17?focusedCommentId=15440048) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
fixed in: https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/1650026285bea52288c7f24720c3caf7cd3ce2a8
PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5
